input_text: Since this morning I can't connect to VPN from my Windows laptop. Error 809. I'm at home. Tried restarting twice.

expected.summary: VPN connection fails with error 809 on Windows from home.

input_text: Outlook keeps asking for my password every 5 minutes on iPhone 13.

expected.summary: Outlook repeatedly prompts for password on iPhone.

input_text: New employee starts Monday. Please provide Jira and Confluence access. Manager: Lara.

expected.summary: Requesting Jira/Confluence access for new employee starting Monday.

input_text: I can't log in to my laptop. It says 'The user name or password is incorrect'.

expected.summary: Laptop login fails with incorrect username/password message.

input_text: Wi-Fi is down on the 3rd floor. Nobody can connect since 10:20.

expected.summary: Wi-Fi outage affecting multiple users on 3rd floor since 10:20.

input_text: Printer near Meeting Room B prints blank pages. Started after we replaced toner yesterday.

expected.summary: Printer near Meeting Room B prints blank pages after toner replacement.

input_text: I need access to the finance shared drive. My username is srana.

expected.summary: Requesting access to finance shared drive for user srana.

input_text: My laptop is very slow and the fan is loud.

expected.summary: Laptop performance is slow and fan is loud.

input_text: Teams won't start on Windows. It just shows a loading screen forever.

expected.summary: Microsoft Teams stuck on loading screen on Windows.

input_text: I accidentally sent confidential info to the wrong external email address. Please advise urgently.

expected.summary: Possible data leak: confidential info sent to wrong external email.

input_text: VPN works from my phone hotspot but not from home Wi-Fi.

expected.summary: VPN works via hotspot but fails on home Wi-Fi.

input_text: Need password reset for my account. Can't access email either.

expected.summary: Password reset needed; user cannot access email.

input_text: Laptop camera not working in Zoom on MacBook. Works in FaceTime.

expected.summary: Zoom cannot access camera on Mac, but camera works in FaceTime.

input_text: Cannot print to PDF anymore. The option disappeared.

expected.summary: Print to PDF option missing.

input_text: My monitor keeps flickering when connected via HDMI.

expected.summary: External monitor flickers over HDMI connection.

input_text: Email delivery is delayed for the whole company, people are reporting messages arrive hours later.

expected.summary: Company-wide email delivery delays reported.

input_text: I get 'Access denied' when opening the HR portal from Chrome.

expected.summary: HR portal shows access denied in Chrome.

input_text: Blue screen on startup. It restarts and blue screens again.

expected.summary: Laptop repeatedly blue-screens on startup in a reboot loop.

input_text: Requesting a new laptop for a colleague joining next month.

expected.summary: Request for new laptop for upcoming joiner next month.

input_text: Slack notifications stopped working on Android after the last update.

expected.summary: Slack notifications not working on Android after update.

input_text: I lost my phone and it has company email on it.

expected.summary: Lost device with company email; potential security risk.

input_text: Can't join Zoom meetings. It says 'You have been removed'.

expected.summary: User cannot join Zoom meetings; receives 'removed' message.

input_text: Internet is very slow in the office today but Wi-Fi still connects.

expected.summary: Office internet is slow though Wi-Fi connects.

input_text: Please install Docker Desktop on my Windows machine. Needed for a project.

expected.summary: Request to install Docker Desktop on Windows.

input_text: I canâ€™t access GitHub from the company network; it times out.

expected.summary: GitHub access times out from company network.

input_text: Forgot my BitLocker recovery key and now my laptop asks for it.

expected.summary: Windows laptop requires BitLocker recovery key; user does not have it.

input_text: Requesting access to SAP system for reporting. I already have VPN.

expected.summary: Requesting SAP reporting access.

input_text: My keyboard types wrong characters sometimes; it fixes after reconnecting.

expected.summary: Keyboard intermittently types wrong characters; temporarily fixed by reconnecting.

input_text: VPN authentication fails only at night. Same credentials work in the morning.

expected.summary: VPN authentication fails at night but works in the morning.

input_text: Our shared calendar disappeared for the whole team.

expected.summary: Team shared calendar missing for multiple users.
